code: import React,{useState,useContext}from"react";import{AuthContext}from"../../context/AuthContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const{login}=useContext(AuthContext);const handleLogin=e=>{e.preventDefault();login(email,password);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"min-h-screen flex justify-center items-center bg-music-background text-white",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,className:"w-96 p-6 rounded bg-gray-800",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-6",children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",className:"w-full mb-4 p-2 bg-gray-900 text-white rounded",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",className:"w-full mb-4 p-2 bg-gray-900 text-white rounded",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"w-full bg-music-primary p-2 rounded",children:"Login"})]})});};export default Login;
